metadata.title: CVE-2015-2575 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors component in Oracle MySQL5.1.34 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to affectconfidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors related to Connector/J.

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
